name: López Law Office
description: Offers bilingual civil mediation services in English and Spanish, catering to individuals and business owners. They handle various disputes, including those between homeowners and contractors, neighbors, businesses, and in car accident cases

name: Flores Law Group
description: Provides bilingual mediation services in English and Spanish, with a certified mediator and lawyer, Enrique Flores, Jr., who is fluent in both languages. They assist with negotiations and disputes to reach mutually satisfying agreements

name: Luisa White Law, LLC
description: Offers mediation services, including divorce and family law matters, with a bilingual team that provides services in Spanish

name: Genesis Mediation of Indiana LLC
address: Not explicitly listed, but serves Indiana residents
description: Provides divorce and family mediation services, including parenting plans, elder mediation, and Guardian ad Litem services

name: The Mediation Group LLC
description: Offers professional mediation services with a team of experienced neutrals

name: Resolution Mediation
description: Provides family divorce mediation preparation and consultation services, focusing on guiding clients through divorce issues compassionately and preserving finances and family relationships. They also offer marital mediation

name: Smith Legal LLC
description: Offers mediation services for civil and domestic relations cases, including divorce, custody, and property division. They provide a personable, one-on-one approach and can travel anywhere in the state

name: CCHA Law (Church Church Hittle and Antrim)
address: Multiple locations including Fishers, Fort Wayne, Crown Point, Noblesville, Tipton, and Westfield
phone: Various numbers for each location (e.g., 317.773.2190 for Fishers and Noblesville)
description: Provides mediation and Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) services, including Christian Conciliation. They have qualified mediators ready to assist with various disputes

name: The Resolution Center
address: Multiple locations, including Indianapolis and Brownsburg, IN
description: Offers divorce mediation, divorce coaching, and financial planning services. They focus on Solution-Focused Divorce™ strategies to minimize conflict and promote understanding

name: Indiana Judicial Branch: Self-Service Legal Center
description: Provides information on Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) in Indiana, including mediation. It also mentions that some county courts offer low-cost or no-cost mediation services for families involved in divorce or paternity cases who meet financial eligibility requirements
